show list of accounts:
SELECT
    name AS AccountName,
    accountnumber AS AccountNumber,
    address1_line1 AS AddressLine1,
    address1_line2 AS AddressLine2,
    address1_line3 AS AddressLine3,
    address1_city AS City,
    address1_stateorprovince AS StateOrProvince,
    address1_postalcode AS PostalCode,
    address1_country AS Country
FROM
    [dbo].[account]
Show list of leads:
SELECT
    fullname AS LeadName,
    companyname AS Company,
    statuscode AS Status,
    emailaddress1 AS Email,
    telephone1 AS Telephone,
    mobilephone AS MobilePhone,
    address1_city As City
FROM
    [dbo].[lead]
WHERE
    statecode = 0
Show revenue forecast for next 6 months:
SELECT
    DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(estimatedclosedate), MONTH(estimatedclosedate), 1) AS MonthStart,
    SUM(estimatedvalue) AS TotalEstimatedRevenue
FROM
    [dbo].[opportunity]
WHERE
    estimatedclosedate >= DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0)
    AND estimatedclosedate < DATEADD(MONTH, 6, DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0))
GROUP BY
    DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(estimatedclosedate), MONTH(estimatedclosedate), 1)
ORDER BY
    MonthStart
